items.title: Language
items.content: React or any other component framework (Vue, Angular)

items.title: Experience
items.content: Real-life professional experience implementing and managing web apps in production (sites, ecommerces, etc)

props.title:
High-Performance
Web Dev with deco.cx
props.subtitle: From Beginner to Expert: Master deco.cx for Elite Web and Storefront Development

items.title: Build whatever you want
items.subTitle:
Landing Pages, Blogs, Storefronts, or anything else!
Finally get that idea out of the paper or select a job from our marketplace (and get paid)!

items.title: Compete for over R$20K
items.subTitle:
Get ready to claim your slice of the prize pool worth over R$25,000 in cash rewards!
We´ll also have iFood vouchers, coveted deco.cx gear & more!

items.title: Content for Web Masters
items.subTitle:
Turn your freelance projects into a profitable business.
We´ll have speakers and workshops to train you into a web entrepreneur!

items.title: Speed-test deco.cx
items.subTitle:
Take the first step to create high-performance, scalable site using TS, JSX, Tailwind.
Join a community of potential collaborators and opportunities.
